title: Fields of Flowers in Bloom, near Caen
marks:
Signature
Black stencil, verso of canvas: 12 / P. LLC, in blue: [J. Metzinger]
text: Recent conservation of this picture was made possible by a generous contribution from an anonymous patron through the Adopt-a-Painting program.
description: pointillist landscape with fields of predominately pink and some yellow flowers, probably Anemones de Caen; purple elements (Caen skyline) at horizon line
